website_summaries.verdict: New Balance takes up the legendary 574 silhouette and meshes it with the style of the older 1970s classic Pro Court model. The result is the All Coasts 574, a more lightweight, flexible, and highly skateable shoe. The All Coasts 574 looks crisper and cleaner than its predecessors.Its construction is built with premium materials. This classics-inspired All Coasts 574 walks straight into the modern era.
pros: A good deal of testers have remarked that the New Balance All Coasts 574 is comfortable to wear and suitable for long walks
It has the look and feel of a solid retro skate shoe, which has delighted some shoppers
According to a handful of reviewers, the All Coasts 574 is sturdy, built with high-quality materials
Its heel cup and footbed feel soft and cozy to a few wearers
The All Coasts 574 has broken New Balance’s dad shoe stereotype, a user points out
Several customers share about getting complimented by friends and onlookers while wearing the All Coasts 574
cons: The plastic behind the heel has kept a few wearers from going without socks, as it rubs against the heel and causes blisters
The All Coasts 574 feels heavy on feet, at least one reviewer has remarked

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great, and they fit pretty well. The build quality is a little iffy though. The sole on these is incredibly stiff and noisy to walk in. When I walk it sounds like I'm wearing a stiff wooden soled dress shoe. They literally echo down hallways and thud against floors. I've never had a skate shoe or sneaker with as stiff a sole as these new balances 574's. Sometimes the sole will even creek, which I find annoying, but after putting in some in-soles this seems to have mostly resolved itself.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, yet there's something ... doofy about them.
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat, I'll say that I absolutely love these. Just holding them and staring at them I'm entranced a bit, they're really cool! Retro vibe to them and the colors (burgundy) are really beautiful, except for the inside and sole, such an ugly obtrusive grey! Not sure why they went with it, but at the same time it's the only color I can imagine working with the rest of the shoe (though it maybe should've all been burgundy..hm, or navy blue?). Anyways, super sturdy. So sturdy, in fact, that you can hear them clacking down the hall 100m away - they're built like a rock! Overall, I love them, but they're a very .. particular .. shoe.
customer_reviews.author: VoidofSalads

customer_reviews.title: Wide width was not wide
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the width of a Vans/Keds style sneaker but NOPE! New Balance wides have always had the width I need, but not this design.
customer_reviews.author: Texas515

customer_reviews.title: Muy mal producto... pesimo.
customer_reviews.text: these shoes were the exact dimensions of shoes he had purchased from another company. Upon opening up the box, the shoes resembled those of a medium width. Even after re-lacing the shoes and him trying them on, it was very clear that they were too small for his feet. This is disappointing because New Balance has such a good reputation for the quality of their shoes and these would have been a very nice pair for him to own. Not to mention that they cost almost $80 with tax. New Balance should really consider either correctly labeling their shoes or discontinue their "wide" size seeing as it is not any wider than a medium.
customer_reviews.author: marvin gomez diaz

customer_reviews.title: Wide width...isnt
customer_reviews.text: Normally a NB wide shoe is comfy, but the wide version of these did not come close. Good looking shoe, but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Butensky

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were for my husband. They reminded him of skate shoes he owned when he was younger and he likes New Balance. He ordered the same size he usually buys in New Balance shoes, a 10.5. These shoes were too small. So I would recommend a .5 size up. They match the description perfectly, but are too expensive in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G.

customer_reviews.title: The right shoes with the right fit.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is extremely picky . With wide feet its hard to find shoes that fit him just right, that are stylish. These shoes fit both those things . Add in they are exactly the style of skate shoe he was looking for . Highly recommended these shoes . You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HelpingHand

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes. I am a girl and in women's shoes my size is 7.5. So, I bought size 6. The sneakers are cool, good looking, good quality. In the other hand, they are a bit heavy and a bit tight on me. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wide feet and these shoes were the exact dimensions of shoes he had purchased from another company. Upon opening up the box, the shoes resembled those of a medium width. Even after re-lacing the shoes and him trying them on, it was very clear that they were too small for his feet. This is disappointing because New Balance has such a good reputation for the quality of their shoes and these would have been a very nice pair for him to own. Not to mention that they cost almost $80 with tax. New Balance should really consider either correctly labeling their shoes or discontinue their "wide" size seeing as it is not any wider than a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this shoe as a gift for my son. I asked for "Black". when the shoe was delivered, it was Navy Blue. I asked for a return tag because his wife told me he liked the Black shoe. I gave them to him anyway, and told him he came exchange them for the color he wanted. He loved them. I've seen him wear them 3 times. We are not returning them. I hope you recharge my account soon because he loves them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoe. With the Burgundy color scheme they have a retro vibe straight out of the box. Mine fit true to size I’m regularly a 9, ordered the 9 good to go. In my opinion NB tend to have a naturally wider fit than Nike or Adidas. All round great purchase
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Good but bad
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, decent skate shoes. Wear very quickly. Split seams at 2 hours of moderate skating.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Go cowboys !
customer_reviews.text: These are narrower and longer than i expected but they are durable quality made and the look great with my cowboys shirt!
customer_reviews.author: nat depp

customer_reviews.title: Glad they’re wide. Could be wider.
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly wide feet so it’s hard to find cool sneakers that don’t cramp my toes. NB is known to offer wider opinions of all their products and I was glad to see these were available at larger widths. I will say that they are still a little tight in the toe box but it’s MUCH better than my little toe getting crushed
customer_reviews.author: Harper Family

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!!! But very narrow and runs small
customer_reviews.text: Bought a half size up in this shoe and still waaaaaay too narrow. Should have gotten a wide or a whole size up. Exchanged for w and size up and happy
customer_reviews.author: Zack Keys

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I usually get a New Balance wide. Some times it is a touch too wide, but it has never been too narrow until now.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow......
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice & sturdy but way to small... I ordered a size 11.5 EE . I don't know if they were miss tagged but they were way too narrow. I have a few pairs of other brands that are D & E . the D's are wider than these were. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: James Owens

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes felt completely comfortable the first time I put them on. I got the wide version (normally I don't need wide) but they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Look better then wear
customer_reviews.text: No arch support but you get what you pay for. Kinda snug in front around toes. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Virg

customer_reviews.title: Size not standard to New balance sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I wear New balance sneakers on a regular basis and size on is fine I found these sneakers to be extremely narrow compared to the standard New balance sneakers. I'm trying to contact Amazon now to see how I could exchange them after wearing them one time my feet are so red and sore I will never wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: scott gold

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit well for a size 9. Comfortable and holding up well so far
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Comfy less control.
customer_reviews.text: I think I ordered them to large. My only gripe with them is the grip. It feels like I have less control of my board. My favorite thing about them is when landing the support and padding help with the impact. My feet’s are less sore than with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: nolliekf

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I did not believe all the reviews, but they were right. I have wide feet and bought the wide size since my other new balances in wide fit better than any other brand with wide sizes. These felt just like a regular width.
customer_reviews.author: James Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough even with the 2e wide
customer_reviews.text: 2e and still not a wide these are not even a medium The length is right widths not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like the tennis shoes I was comfortable shoes I have
customer_reviews.text: Really like the tennis shoes I was comfortable shoes I have
customer_reviews.author: James L Branzei

customer_reviews.title: Rad!
customer_reviews.text: Rad looking shoe, its cool that they made a skate version of the 574. I was worried it might be too narrow based on other reviews so I got the 2E in my regular size and it fits perfect. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bolte

customer_reviews.title: Definitely run narrow
customer_reviews.text: They were slightly bulkier than I anticipated the reviews stated they did run narrow usually I wear an eight or an eight and a half so I ordered a size 9 they definitely run narrow I would suggest ordering a full size if not a size 10 1/2 larger
customer_reviews.author: adam j christensen

customer_reviews.title: good fit, good price
customer_reviews.text: I always wear New Balance shoes with 4E width. At first I worry this shoe may not fit well. But the result exceeds my expectation. It fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Qingguo

customer_reviews.title: Not what is expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe but they will kill your feet. Not to comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Look good. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered a wide. But they look good on him (my husband)!
customer_reviews.author: Onnie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a great shoe for the price It went beyond my expectations , in fact I bought another same type show but in a different color two thumbs up 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Da animal

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow for my wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought 10.5 wide and they’re way too narrow for my wide feet. This is not a wide shoe.
customer_reviews.author: David Shinn

customer_reviews.title: ‘Classic=Skate’ experience
customer_reviews.text: True to feeling of the Classic 574 but with flat slate feel. Miss the classic but ordering these and wearing them is like putting the Classics 574 back on.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful non skating shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! Not for skating, these will shred if you’re a serious about skating in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: Even in the wide width it was a little on the narrow side. Still reasonably comfortable. Good quality material and construction
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t feel like a quality shoe unlike my other NB shoes
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: said black and white however they were blue and white...
customer_reviews.text: My son said he liked the blue so no complaints but it could have gone south if he really wanted the black
customer_reviews.author: David Vickers

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit tight, and I have narrow feet. I think they'll be great broken in, but I'd probably go a half size up next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lebowski

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old has no complaints. They fit well
customer_reviews.author: Arock

customer_reviews.title: Not a wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is not a wide shoe. Even tho the tag and description say differently, this is a really narrow shoe for being a wide. Looked great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jake F

customer_reviews.title: Not Black and White...Navy and White
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Very comfortable. Not Black and White though. They are Navy and White.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good style
customer_reviews.text: the shoes were nice but not wide enough for my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: standard size width
customer_reviews.text: Regulars width size D is tight. Used a shoe horn to stretch
customer_reviews.author: stuartD

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 574 Skate Sneaker
product_meta.description: The 574 is a staple of the New Balance brand and its heritage, a design that stands the test of time. Weave taken a beloved shoe and modernized it by using a court-style bottom with a comfortable REVlite midsole to increase comfort for all day wear. The same 574 look that you know with a sole that you can wear for every occasion.
feature_bullets: REVlite midsole delivers incredibly lightweight cushioning
Lace closure ensures a secure fit
